localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Incident Timer is a “days without incident” timer for developers. The beautifully designed dashboard helps you to keep track of major software incidents. It’s free and takes just 2 minutes to set up.
blogPost.body: Incident Timer is a “days without incident” timer for developers. The beautifully designed dashboard helps you to keep track of major software incidents. It’s free and takes just 2 minutes to set up.
blogPost.title: Incident Timer - A “days without incident” timer for developers
blogPost.author: Pruthviraj Haral

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款专为开发者设计的 "天无事故 "计时器。设计精美的仪表盘可以帮助你跟踪重大软件事件。它是免费的，只需要2分钟就可以设置。
localize.tagline: 开发者的 "无事故天数 "计时器

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款專爲開發者設計的 "天無事故 "計時器。設計精美的儀表盤可以幫助你跟蹤重大軟件事件。它是免費的，只需要2分鐘就可以設置。
localize.tagline: 開發者的 "無事故天數 "計時器

previous.excerpt: Your own version of The Bachelor(ette). Every week, we'll feature bachelor(ette)s you can pitch a date to. We'll live stream some of the finalists. Even if you're not interested in dating one of our bachelor(ette)s, you can matchmake them for prizes.
previous.title: Pitch a Date - Pitch a date to one of our bachelor(ette)s.

localize.description: 你自己版本的单身汉(ette)。每周，我们都会推出你可以投递约会对象的单身汉。我们会直播一些决赛选手。即使你没有兴趣和我们的单身汉约会，你也可以和他们做媒来获得奖品。
localize.tagline: 向我们的单身汉们推荐一个约会。

localize.description: 你自己版本的單身漢(ette)。每週，我們都會推出你可以投遞約會對象的單身漢。我們會直播一些決賽選手。即使你沒有興趣和我們的單身漢約會，你也可以和他們做媒來獲得獎品。
localize.tagline: 向我們的單身漢們推薦一個約會。

next.excerpt: Here you'll find a collection of hand-curated tools that let you get more done with less time and effort 🚀 Each app has been designed with a specific task in mind, on top of being beautiful, intuitive, and fun to use 🤘
next.title: Hidden Tools - Explore a collection of hand curated tools 🛠

localize.description: 在这里，你会发现一系列精心设计的工具，让你用更少的时间和精力完成更多的工作🚀，每个应用程序都是针对特定的任务而设计的，除了美观、直观和有趣的使用🤘。
localize.tagline: 探索一系列手工制作的工具 🛠。

localize.description: 在這裏，你會發現一系列精心設計的工具，讓你用更少的時間和精力完成更多的工作🚀，每個應用程序都是針對特定的任務而設計的，除了美觀、直觀和有趣的使用🤘。
localize.tagline: 探索一系列手工製作的工具 🛠。
